page.title: Services
page.description: Discover AngoraSix services: expert guidance and methodology support combined with our powerful platform for transparent project management.

hero.title: Guidance and tools to build better, together
hero.subtitle: From early support to transparent scaling — our services work seamlessly to help you launch and grow your project with clarity and fairness.

guidance.title: Guidance & Methodology Services
guidance.subtitle: We're your partners in building better. Get expert support with proven frameworks and methodologies to set your project up for success from day one.

agile.title: Agile Methodologies
agile.description: Adopt Scrum-lite approaches for rhythm and structure in early stages, maintaining momentum without overwhelming your team with process overhead.

lean.title: Lean Startup
lean.description: Fast experimentation and validation techniques to sustain motivation, reduce waste, and sharpen focus on what truly matters to your users.

design.title: Design Thinking
design.description: User-centered discovery and solution shaping methodologies to ensure you're building products people actually want and need.

management.title: Fair Management Frameworks
management.description: Help your team align on what 'fair' means and implement transparent governance and financial processes that everyone understands.

platform.title: AngoraSix Platform
platform.subtitle: A natural extension of your framework — gain efficiency while upholding your transparency and fairness principles, as you've set them.

contribution.title: Contribution Tracking
contribution.description: Automatically capture and measure what each team member contributes through seamless integrations with your existing tools and workflows.

ownership.title: Dynamic Ownership
ownership.description: Transform contributions into clear, transparent ownership calculations that everyone can understand and trust.

governance.title: Transparent Governance
governance.description: Implement the decision-making frameworks you've designed with automated, contribution-weighted voting and clear audit trails.

finance.title: Automated Distribution
finance.description: Distribute income, equity, and rewards automatically based on your established rules, removing bias and manual errors.

combined.title: Better together: Guidance + Platform
combined.description: Start with expert guidance to establish your foundations, then power-up with our platform to automate and scale your fair and transparent processes. The perfect combination for sustainable growth.

calendar.title: Schedule a Consultation
calendar.description: Book a one hour consultation call to discuss your project's needs and how our guidance services can help you build better from day one.
calendar.meetingType: One hour video call via Google Meet
calendar.footer: All times are shown in your local timezone. You'll receive a confirmation email with the meeting details.
